scripts.apply-direct-fix: echo 'Please run the direct-csrf-fix.sql script in the Supabase SQL editor.'
scripts.debug-fix: echo 'Please run the debug-csrf-protection.sql script in the Supabase SQL editor, then run debug-csrf.'
scripts.complete-fix: echo 'Please run the csrf-fix-complete.sql script in the Supabase SQL editor for the most comprehensive fix.'
scripts.safe-fix: echo 'Please run the csrf-fix-complete-safe.sql script in the Supabase SQL editor to avoid JSON syntax errors.'
